verses.verse: Moreover the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, Take <WH3947> you a great <WH1419> roll, <WH1549> and write <WH3789> in it with a man's <WH582> pen <WH2747> concerning Mahershalalhashbaz. <WH4122>
And I took to me faithful <WH539> witnesses <WH5707> to record, <WH5749> Uriah <WH223> the priest, <WH3548> and Zechariah <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Jeberechiah. <WH3000>

And I went <WH7126> to the prophetess; <WH5031> and she conceived, <WH2029> and bore <WH3205> a son. <WH1121> Then said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> to me, Call <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Mahershalalhashbaz. <WH4122>

For before <WH2962> the child <WH5288> shall have knowledge <WH3045> to cry, <WH7121> My father, <WH1> and my mother, <WH517> the riches <WH2428> of Damascus <WH1834> and the spoil <WH7998> of Samaria <WH8111> shall be taken <WH5375> away before <WH6440> the king <WH4428> of Assyria. <WH804>
The LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> also to me again, <WH3254> saying, <WH559>

For as much <WH3282> <WH365> as this <WH2088> people <WH5971> refuses <WH3988> the waters <WH4325> of Shiloah <WH7975> that go <WH1980> softly, <WH328> and rejoice <WH4885> in Rezin <WH7526> and Remaliah's <WH7425> son; <WH1121>

Now therefore, <WH3651> behold, <WH2009> the Lord <WH136> brings <WH5927> up on them the waters <WH4325> of the river, <WH5104> strong <WH6099> and many, <WH7227> even <WH853> the king <WH4428> of Assyria, <WH804> and all <WH3605> his glory: <WH3519> and he shall come <WH5927> up over <WH5921> all <WH3605> his channels, <WH650> and go <WH1980> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> his banks: <WH1415>

And he shall pass <WH2498> through Judah; <WH3063> he shall overflow <WH7857> and go <WH5674> over, <WH5674> he shall reach <WH5060> even to the neck; <WH6677> and the stretching <WH4298> out of his wings <WH3671> shall fill <WH4393> the breadth <WH7341> of your land, <WH776> O Immanuel. <WH6005>

Associate <WH7489> yourselves, O you people, <WH5971> and you shall be broken <WH2844> in pieces; and give ear, <WH238> all <WH3605> you of far <WH4801> countries: <WH776> gird <WH247> yourselves, and you shall be broken <WH2844> in pieces; gird <WH247> yourselves, and you shall be broken <WH2844> in pieces.
Take counsel <WH6098> together, and it shall come to nothing; <WH6565> speak <WH1696> the word, <WH1697> and it shall not stand: <WH6965> for God <WH410> is with us.

For the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> thus <WH3541> to me with a strong <WH2393> hand, <WH3027> and instructed <WH3256> me that I should not walk <WH3212> in the way <WH1870> of this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559>

Say <WH559> you not, A confederacy, <WH7195> to all <WH3605> them to whom <WH834> this <WH2088> people <WH5971> shall say, <WH559> A confederacy; <WH7195> neither <WH3808> fear <WH3372> you their fear, <WH4172> nor <WH3808> be afraid. <WH6206>
Sanctify <WH6942> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> himself; and let him be your fear, <WH4172> and let him be your dread. <WH6206>

And he shall be for a sanctuary; <WH4720> but for a stone <WH68> of stumbling <WH5063> and for a rock <WH6697> of offense <WH4383> to both <WH8147> the houses <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> for a gin <WH6341> and for a snare <WH4170> to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem. <WH3389>
And many <WH7227> among them shall stumble, <WH3782> and fall, <WH5307> and be broken, <WH7665> and be snared, <WH3369> and be taken. <WH3920>
Bind <WH6887> up the testimony, <WH8584> seal <WH2856> the law <WH8451> among my disciples. <WH3928>
And I will wait <WH2442> on the LORD, <WH3068> that hides <WH5641> his face <WH6440> from the house <WH1004> of Jacob, <WH3290> and I will look <WH6960> for him.

Behold, <WH2009> I and the children <WH3206> whom <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> has given <WH5414> me are for signs <WH226> and for wonders <WH4159> in Israel <WH3478> from the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> which dwells <WH7931> in mount <WH2022> Zion. <WH6726>

And when <WH3588> they shall say <WH559> to you, Seek <WH1875> to them that have familiar spirits, <WH178> and to wizards <WH3049> that peep, <WH6850> and that mutter: <WH1897> should not a people <WH5971> seek <WH1875> to their God? <WH430> for the living <WH2416> to the dead? <WH4191>
To the law <WH8451> and to the testimony: <WH8584> if <WH518> they speak <WH559> not according to this <WH2088> word, <WH1697> it is because <WH834> there is no <WH369> light <WH7837> in them.

And they shall pass <WH5674> through it, hardly <WH7185> bestead and hungry: <WH7456> and it shall come <WH1961> to pass, that when <WH3588> they shall be hungry, <WH7456> they shall fret <WH7107> themselves, and curse <WH7043> their king <WH4428> and their God, <WH430> and look <WH6437> upward. <WH4605>

And they shall look <WH5027> to the earth; <WH776> and behold <WH2009> trouble <WH6869> and darkness, <WH2825> dimness <WH4588> of anguish; <WH6695> and they shall be driven <WH5080> to darkness. <WH653>
